biotools.summary: Web-based tool for visualizing experimental data in the context of biological pathways. It produces animations or static images of KEGG pathways by overlaying public or user uploaded high-thourghput data over handdrawn KEGG pathway maps.

bioschemas.name: KEGGanim
bioschemas.summary: Web-based tool for visualizing experimental data in the context of biological pathways. It produces animations or static images of KEGG pathways by overlaying public or user uploaded high-thourghput data over handdrawn KEGG pathway maps.
